players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "We lost Diana on the first night. With only 3 of us left and 1 mafioso among us, we need to be very careful with our vote today. Does anyone have any information to share?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a bold lie. I investigated Alice last night and she's the mafioso. Why are you trying to protect her?"

You: "Bob, you just claimed to investigate me, but Charlie already claimed to be the detective who investigated you. We can't have two detectives in a 4-player game with only 1 detective role. Your lie just exposed you as the mafioso."
Charlie: "Bob's claim to be the detective is impossible. There is only one detective, and it's me. He is the mafioso."

Bob: "I never claimed to be the detective. I said I investigated Alice, which was a lie to test Charlie's claim. But Charlie's story doesn't add up - why investigate Bob first night when Diana was a more logical choice?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
